Source.Name: perl-text-csv
Source.Summary: Text::CSV - comma-separated values manipulator (using XS or PurePerl)
Source.Description: Text::CSV is a thin wrapper for Text::CSV_XS-compatible modules now. All the backend modules provide facilities for the composition and decomposition of comma-separated values. Text::CSV uses Text::CSV_XS by default, and when Text::CSV_XS is not available, falls back on Text::CSV_PP, which is bundled in the same distribution as this module.
